LanguageData.Plant_AYStJohnsWort.label: St Johns Wort
LanguageData.Plant_AYStJohnsWort.description: Hypericum perforatum, known as perforate St John's-wort, common Saint John's wort and St John's wort, is a flowering plant in the family Hypericaceae. A calming medicinal herb, the plant is poisonous to livestock.
